time.h

00001 #ifndef TIME_H
00002 #define TIME_H
00003 
00004 #include <sys/time.h>
00005 #include <stdio.h>
00006 
00007 #define StartTimer(i) start_timer((i))
00008 #define StopTimer(i) stop_timer((i))
00009 #define ResetTimer(i) reset_timer((i))
00010 #define PrintTimer(str, i)              \
00011     if (get_worker_id() == MASTER_RANK) \
00012         printf("%s : %f seconds\n", (str), get_timer((i)));
00013 
00014 double get_current_time()
00015 {
00016     timeval t;
00017     gettimeofday(&t, 0);
00018     return (double)t.tv_sec + (double)t.tv_usec / 1000000;
00019 }
00020 
00021 const int N_Timers = 5; //currently, 5 timers are available
00022 static double _timers[N_Timers]; // timers
00023 static double _acc_time[N_Timers]; // accumulated time
00024 
00025 void init_timers()
00026 {
00027     for (int i = 0; i < N_Timers; i++) {
00028         _acc_time[i] = 0;
00029     }
00030 }
00031 
00032 enum TIMERS {
00033     WORKER_TIMER = 0,
00034     SERIALIZATION_TIMER = 1,
00035     TRANSFER_TIMER = 2,
00036     COMMUNICATION_TIMER = 3
00037 };
00038 //currently, only 4 timers are used, others can be defined by users
00039 
00040 void start_timer(int i)
00041 {
00042     _timers[i] = get_current_time();
00043 }
00044 
00045 void reset_timer(int i)
00046 {
00047     _timers[i] = get_current_time();
00048     _acc_time[i] = 0;
00049 }
00050 
00051 void stop_timer(int i)
00052 {
00053     double t = get_current_time();
00054     _acc_time[i] += t - _timers[i];
00055 }
00056 
00057 double get_timer(int i)
00058 {
00059     return _acc_time[i];
00060 }
00061 
00062 #endif
